normal.name: Wind Assault
normal.description: Deals wind damage equal to 120% of Attack to designated enemy unit

auto.name: Eye of the Storm
auto.description: Deals wind damage equal to 72% of Attack to enemy unit and surrounding enemies within 4 meters

ultimate.name: Sticky Bat Storm
ultimate.description: Deals wind damage equal to 120% of Attack to enemies within 4 meters. Applies [Vulnerability]: Affected enemies take 34% increased damage for 15 seconds. With Awakening 6: Also applies [Weathering] debuff to affected enemies

passive.name: Fierce Wind Burst
passive.description: Auto Skills can apply Weathering: every 2 s deal 14.4% ATK wind damage per stack, max 5 stacks

awakenings.effect: When dealing damage to targets with continuous damage effects: Self attack power increases by 20%
Continuous damage effects penetration rate increased by 10%
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
[Ultimate Skill] and [Passive] level and level cap +4
Ultimate skill can also apply [Weathering] debuff

memoryCard.name: Busy Officer (忙里偷闲)
effects: When dealing continuous damage effects: Target takes 12% increased damage for 2 seconds
